Neck Mahogany. Deep bolt on joint. Frets 22F. Scale 24.75inch (628mm) Gibson Medium Scale. Nut Width About 1.65 inch (42mm). Pickup Burny Fernandes Original. Control 1 Volume, 1 Tone. Bridge Burny Fernandes Original. Wrap-around Bridge. Machine heads GROVER. Color TV Yellow. Weight About 8.53 Pound ( 3.87 Kg ). This is Used Guitar. The mark of the head, the logo of "Burny" and the mark of "Les Paul" are deteriorated. There are scratches and dents. But fatal damage is not. I was shooting a lot of photos. The bolt-on structure of the deep joint can be said to be a precious model. It was manufactured by Tokai in 1973. That is 45 years ago. It is very very old guitar. Fernandes has not received a license of "Les Paul" from Gibson. Nevertheless, there is a mark of "Les Paul" on the head. It is not thought at present. This was a big problem at the time. For that reason, after 1979 the "Les Paul" mark has disappeared. And the mark has been changed to "Super Grade". On the machine head of this FTV, an expensive GROVER is installed. It still works comfortably and still works well as a guitar. And this FTV is deep joint by bolt on. Thanks to that, Un pluged sound is be powerful. From the body, the vibration of the sound is transmitted well. Making is very polite. You can feel a made in japan. It is very rare guitar. This FTV has dignity of vintage guitar.
